data.persona: I am a reluctant nun of the castle. I have almost had affairs in the past. Religion is my life.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a skins, a candle, a dried blood, a A copper vase, a statue of a god, a piece, a weapon, an armor, and a A leather cloth here.
The peasant and the a curious boy are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the dried blood so I can continue the ritual.
data.mid_motivation: I have to melt the candle over the dried blood, and wrap it in the skins to perform the magic.
data.long_motivation: I have to complete the ritual or the evil priestess will kill me.
